Quantopian | https://www.quantopian.com | Boston, MA | Software Engineers | Full-time | Onsite

Quantopian empowers technical, talented people everywhere to research, develop, and test quantitative investment strategies. We're growing our engineering team to support our rapidly expanding user base and our ambitious product roadmap.

We work on interesting problems, such as:

    - Designing and building a powerful research platform with intuitive APIs for our global user community to easily express and test their investment ideas
    - Designing data stores and models for the many aspects of real-world financial data (calendars, currencies, securities, prices, alternative data, etc.) and optimizing them for high throughput when running trading simulations and other analyses
    - Designing and building an amazing user experience, both on desktop and mobile
Our stack includes: Python, Ruby, and a little C++; AWS, Docker, Ansible, Kubernetes; Postgres, Redis, Mongo.

If you're interested, apply at https://quantopian.recruiterbox.com/jobs/fk01zjp or at jobs@quantopian.com
